title: Avocado and sunflower seed salad
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 heads little gem lettuce - torn', '50g (2 oz) sunflower seeds', '2 avocados - peeled, stones removed and sliced']
